name: Rough Housing
description:
Oh NO! The power is out at my house! Whoop-Dee-Doo! I am not even at home right now so it shouldn't affect me in anyway, right? Hmmmmmm... how about ...... No!

Without power, your "starving" home appliances are now fighting each other for the remaining batteries. (Why? IDK. Cybert**nian technology maybe?)

Become a toaster, or a washing machine, fight for the batteries and bring them back to your charging stations. This is your last stand (until you run out of power and need another battery of course).

P.S. This game was designed to be played with two PS4 controllers but I have added support for keyboards (with a numpad) as well, see below.

P.S.2 Please play with around 1280*720 resolution.

Keyboard Controls:
Main Screen:
player 1 uses the w key to change the character to play with, player 2 uses the up arrow.
press space to start the game
Ingame:
player 1 uses ad to move, space to jump, j (and k if is washer) to attack; player 2 uses left and right arrow to move, up arrow to jump, numpad 5 (and 6 if is washer) to attack.

Made by:
Haotian Shen, Orlando Diaz, Jonatan Wu, and Calvin Cheang
